name: @polymer/esm-amd-loader
description: Minimal AMD-style loader for replicating ES module behavior.
author: The Polymer Project Authors

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run minify
scripts.get-size: npm run build && cat lib/esm-amd-loader.min.js | gzip -9 > esm-amd-loader.min.js.gz && ls -a -l -h esm-amd-loader.min.js.gz && rm esm-amd-loader.min.js.gz
scripts.test:integration: npm run lint && npm run build && cd test/ && npm run test:wct
